synopsis: Bundled with the limited edition volume 14. The episode adapts chapters 48 and 49, which follow Yuiga and Asami going on a fake date, and Yuiga encountering his teacher Mafuyu Kirisu after she accidentally loses her swimsuit top. (Source: MAL News)
